trans-unit.source: Represents a single tab page in a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TabControl"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Representa uma página de separador único num <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TabControl"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: TabPage controls represent the tabbed pages in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl> control.
trans-unit.target: Controlos de TabPage representam as páginas separadores um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl>controlo.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl>

trans-unit.source: The order of tab pages in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.TabPages%2A?displayProperty=fullName> collection reflects the order of tabs in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl> control.
trans-unit.target: A ordem das páginas de separador no <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.TabPages%2A?displayProperty=fullName>coleção reflete a ordem de separadores no <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl>controlo.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.TabPages%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: To change the order of tabs in the control, you must change their positions in the collection by removing them and inserting them at new indexes.
trans-unit.target: Para alterar a ordem dos separadores no controlo, tem de alterar os respetivos posições na coleção removendo-los e inserção-las no novo índices.

trans-unit.source: TabPage controls are constrained by their container, so some of the properties inherited from the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control> base class will have no effect, including <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Top%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Height%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Left%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Width%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Show%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Hide%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Controlos de TabPage estão restritos pelo respetivo contentor, para algumas das propriedades herdado do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control>classe base não tem qualquer efeito, incluindo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Top%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Height%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Left%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Width%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Show%2A>e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Hide%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Hide%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Show%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Width%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Left%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Height%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Top%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control>

trans-unit.source: The tabs in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl> are part of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl> but not parts of the individual TabPage controls.
trans-unit.target: Os separadores num <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl>fazem parte do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl>, mas não as partes dos controlos individuais TabPage.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl>

trans-unit.source: Members of the TabPage class, such as the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ForeColor%2A> property, affect only the client rectangle of the tab page, but not the tabs.
trans-unit.target: Classe de membros de TabPage, tais como o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ForeColor%2A>propriedade, afetam apenas o retângulo de cliente da página de separador, mas não os separadores.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ForeColor%2A>

trans-unit.source: Additionally, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Hide%2A> method of the TabPage will not hide the tab.
trans-unit.target: Além disso, o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Hide%2A>método do TabPage não será ocultar no separador.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Hide%2A>

trans-unit.source: To hide the tab, you must remove the TabPage control from the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.TabPages%2A?displayProperty=fullName> collection.
trans-unit.target: Para ocultar o separador, tem de remover o controlo de TabPage a partir de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.TabPages%2A?displayProperty=fullName>coleção.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.TabPages%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > In [!INCLUDE[dnprdnext](~/add/includes/dnprdnext-md.md)], the tab is considered part of the tab page for determining when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Enter> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Leave> events of the TabPage occur.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > No [!INCLUDE[dnprdnext](~/add/includes/dnprdnext-md.md)], no separador é considerado parte da página de separador para determinar quando a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Enter>e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Leave>ocorrem eventos do TabPage.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Leave> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Enter>

trans-unit.source: In earlier versions of the .NET Framework, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Enter> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Leave> events of the TabPage do not occur when focus enters or leaves a tab, but only when focus enters or leaves the client rectangle of the tab page.
trans-unit.target: Em versões anteriores do .NET Framework, o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Enter>e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Leave>eventos do TabPage ocorre quando o foco entra ou sai de um separador, mas apenas quando foco entra ou sai o retângulo de cliente da página de separador.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Leave> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Enter>

trans-unit.source: For more information about how this control responds to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Focus%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Select%2A> methods, see the following <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control> members: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.CanFocus%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.CanSelect%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Focused%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ContainsFocus%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Focus%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Select%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre como este controlo responde ao <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Focus%2A>e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Select%2A>métodos, consulte o seguinte <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control>Membros: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.CanFocus%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.CanSelect%2A> <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Focused%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ContainsFocus%2A> <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Focus%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Select%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Select%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Focus%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ContainsFocus%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Focused%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.CanSelect%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.CanFocus%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Select%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Focus%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Controls contained in a TabPage are not created until the tab page is shown, and any data bindings in these controls are not activated until the tab page is shown.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Controlos incluídos num TabPage não são criados até que é apresentada a página de separador e quaisquer enlaces de dados nestes controlos não estão ativadas até que a página de separador é apresentada.

trans-unit.source: In [!INCLUDE[dnprdnext](~/add/includes/dnprdnext-md.md)], the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.UseVisualStyleBackColor%2A> property lets you indicate whether the background of the tab page should render using the current visual style.
trans-unit.target: No [!INCLUDE[dnprdnext](~/add/includes/dnprdnext-md.md)], a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.UseVisualStyleBackColor%2A>propriedade permite-lhe indicar se o fundo da página de separador deve ser composta com estilo visual actual.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.UseVisualStyleBackColor%2A>

trans-unit.source: This occurs only when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.UseVisualStyleBackColor%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.RenderWithVisualStyles%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property values are both `true` and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.Appearance%2A> property of the parent <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl> is <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabAppearance>.
trans-unit.target: Isto ocorre apenas quando o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.UseVisualStyleBackColor%2A>e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.RenderWithVisualStyles%2A?displayProperty=fullName>valores de propriedade são ambos `true` e a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.Appearance%2A>propriedade do elemento principal <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl>é <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabAppearance>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabAppearance> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.Appearance%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.RenderWithVisualStyles%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.UseVisualStyleBackColor%2A>

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, the background is painted normally.
trans-unit.target: Caso contrário, o ser pintado o fundo normalmente.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TabPage"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TabPage"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TabPage"></xref> class and specifies the text for the tab.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TabPage"> </xref> classe e especifica o texto para o separador.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.Text%2A> property is set to the value of the `text` parameter.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.Text%2A>propriedade está definida para o valor da `text` parâmetro.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.Text%2A>

trans-unit.source: The text for the tab.
trans-unit.target: O texto para o separador.

trans-unit.source: This member is not meaningful for this control.
trans-unit.target: Este membro não é significativo para este controlo.

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.AnchorStyles"></xref> value.
trans-unit.target: An <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.AnchorStyles"></xref> value.

trans-unit.source: This property is not meaningful for this control.
trans-unit.target: Esta propriedade não é significativa para este controlo.

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O valor predefinido é <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.AutoSize*> property changes.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando o valor da <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.AutoSize*>alterações de propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.AutoSize*>

trans-unit.source: Although you can change the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.AutoSize%2A> property and handle this event to determine when the value changes, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.AutoSize%2A> property is not meaningful for this control.
trans-unit.target: Embora o pode alterar o valor da <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.AutoSize%2A>propriedade e processar este evento para determinar quando o valor é alterado, o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.AutoSize%2A>propriedade não é significativa para este controlo.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.AutoSize%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.AutoSize%2A>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: This property is not meaningful for this control.
trans-unit.target: Esta propriedade não é significativa para este controlo.

trans-unit.source: The control grows as much as necessary to fit its contents but does not shrink smaller than the value of its size property
trans-unit.target: O controlo cresce quanto necessário ajustar o respetivo conteúdo, mas não reduzir menor que o valor da propriedade respetivo tamanho

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the background color for the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TabPage"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define a cor de fundo para a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TabPage"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default value of the BackColor property is the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DefaultBackColor%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property unless the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.UseVisualStyleBackColor%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.RenderWithVisualStyles%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property values are both `true` and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.Appearance%2A> property of the parent <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl> has a value of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabAppearance>, in which case the default value of the BackColor property is <xref:System.Drawing.Color.Transparent%2A>.
trans-unit.target: O valor predefinido da propriedade BackColor é o valor da <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DefaultBackColor%2A?displayProperty=fullName>propriedade, a menos que o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.UseVisualStyleBackColor%2A>e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.RenderWithVisualStyles%2A?displayProperty=fullName>valores de propriedade são ambos `true` e a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.Appearance%2A>propriedade de principal <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl>tem um valor de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabAppearance>, em que, caso o valor predefinido da propriedade BackColor é <xref:System.Drawing.Color.Transparent%2A>.</xref:System.Drawing.Color.Transparent%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabAppearance> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.Appearance%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.RenderWithVisualStyles%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.UseVisualStyleBackColor%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DefaultBackColor%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: Child controls that you place on the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage> inherit the BackColor value by default, so this behavior causes the background of the child controls to render with the current visual style.
trans-unit.target: Controlos subordinados que coloque no <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage>herdam o valor de BackColor por predefinição, pelo que este comportamento faz com que o fundo da subordinadas controlos para compor com estilo visual actual.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage>

trans-unit.source: Changing the value of the BackColor property automatically sets the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.UseVisualStyleBackColor%2A> property to `false`.
trans-unit.target: Alterar automaticamente o valor da propriedade BackColor define o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.UseVisualStyleBackColor%2A>propriedade `false`.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.UseVisualStyleBackColor%2A>

trans-unit.source: If you want the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage> background to render using visual styles but you want the child controls to inherit a BackColor value that you specify, set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.UseVisualStyleBackColor%2A> property after you set the BackColor property.
trans-unit.target: Se pretender que o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage>em segundo plano para compor utilizando estilos visuais, mas pretende que os controlos subordinados para herdar de um valor de BackColor que especificar, defina o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.UseVisualStyleBackColor%2A>propriedade depois de definir a propriedade BackColor.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.UseVisualStyleBackColor%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> that represents the background color of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TabPage"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"> </xref> que representa a cor de fundo do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TabPage"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Creates a new instance of the control collection for the control.
trans-unit.target: Cria uma nova instância da coleção de controlo para o controlo.

trans-unit.source: A new instance of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection> assigned to the control.
trans-unit.target: Uma nova instância do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection>atribuído ao controlo.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection>

trans-unit.source: This member is not meaningful for this control.
trans-unit.target: Este membro não é significativo para este controlo.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DockStyle"></xref> value.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DockStyle"></xref> value.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.Dock*> property changes.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando o valor da <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.Dock*>alterações de propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.Dock*>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.Dock%2A> property is not meaningful for this control, although you can change its value and handle the DockChanged event to detect the change.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.Dock%2A>propriedade não é significativa para este controlo, embora o pode alterar o respetivo valor e processar o evento de DockChanged para detetar a alteração.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.Dock%2A>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: This member is not meaningful for this control.
trans-unit.target: Este membro não é significativo para este controlo.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A predefinição é <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.Enabled*> property changes.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando o valor da <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.Enabled*>alterações de propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.Enabled*>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.Enabled%2A> property is not meaningful for this control, although you can change its value and handle the EnabledChanged event to detect the change.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.Enabled%2A>propriedade não é significativa para este controlo, embora o pode alterar o respetivo valor e processar o evento de EnabledChanged para detetar a alteração.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.Enabled%2A>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the tab page that contains the specified object.
trans-unit.target: Obtém a página de separador que contém o objeto especificado.

trans-unit.source: The object to look for.
trans-unit.target: O objeto para procurar.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TabPage"></xref> that contains the specified object, or <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> if the object cannot be found.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TabPage"> </xref> que contém o objeto especificado, ou <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref> se não é possível encontrar o objeto.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the index to the image displayed on this tab.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o índice da imagem apresentada neste separador.

trans-unit.source: The ImageIndex points to an image in the associated <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.ImageList%2A> of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl>.
trans-unit.target: O ImageIndex aponta para uma imagem no associado <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.ImageList%2A>de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.ImageList%2A>

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index to the image in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.ImageList%2A?displayProperty=fullName> that appears on the tab.
trans-unit.target: O índice baseado em zero para a imagem no <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.ImageList%2A?displayProperty=fullName> que aparece no separador.

trans-unit.source: The default is -1, which signifies no image.
trans-unit.target: A predefinição é de -1, o que não significa nenhuma imagem.

trans-unit.source: The ImageIndex value is less than -1.
trans-unit.target: O valor de ImageIndex é inferior a -1.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the key accessor for the image in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.ImageList*> of the associated <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TabControl"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o acessor de chave para a imagem no <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.ImageList*>de associada <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TabControl"> </xref>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.ImageList*>

trans-unit.source: The ImageKey property specifies the image from the image list to display on the control.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade ImageKey Especifica a imagem a partir da lista de imagem para apresentar no controlo.

trans-unit.source: A string representing the key of the image.
trans-unit.target: Uma cadeia que representa a chave da imagem.

trans-unit.source: This property is not meaningful for this control.
trans-unit.target: Esta propriedade não é significativa para este controlo.

trans-unit.source: The x and y coordinates which specifies the location of the object.
trans-unit.target: Os x e y coordena que especifica a localização do objeto.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.Location*> property changes.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando o valor da <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.Location*>alterações de propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.Location*>

trans-unit.source: Although you can change the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.Location%2A> property and handle this event to determine when the value changes, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.Location%2A> property is not meaningful for this control.
trans-unit.target: Embora o pode alterar o valor da <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.Location%2A>propriedade e processar este evento para determinar quando o valor é alterado, o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.Location%2A>propriedade não é significativa para este controlo.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.Location%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.Location%2A>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: This property is not meaningful for this control.
trans-unit.target: Esta propriedade não é significativa para este controlo.

trans-unit.source: The upper limit of the size of the objet.
trans-unit.target: O limite superior do tamanho do objet.

trans-unit.source: This property is not meaningful for this control.
trans-unit.target: Esta propriedade não é significativa para este controlo.

trans-unit.source: The lower limit of the size of the objet.
trans-unit.target: O limite inferior de tamanho do objet.

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control.Enter"></xref> event of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TabPage"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Gera o <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control.Enter"> </xref> eventos do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TabPage"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: In [!INCLUDE[dnprdnext](~/add/includes/dnprdnext-md.md)], the tab is considered part of the tab page for determining when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Enter> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Leave> events of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage> occur.
trans-unit.target: No [!INCLUDE[dnprdnext](~/add/includes/dnprdnext-md.md)], no separador é considerado parte da página de separador para determinar quando a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Enter>e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Leave>eventos do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage>ocorrer.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Leave> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Enter>

trans-unit.source: In earlier versions of the .NET Framework, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Enter> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Leave> events of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage> do not occur when focus enters or leaves a tab, but only when focus enters or leaves the client rectangle of the tab page.
trans-unit.target: Em versões anteriores do .NET Framework, o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Enter>e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Leave>eventos do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage>ocorre quando o foco entra ou sai de um separador, mas apenas quando o foco entra ou sai o retângulo de cliente da página de separador.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Leave> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Enter>

trans-unit.source: Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate.
trans-unit.target: Gerar um evento invoca o processador de eventos através de um delegado.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Events](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte [eventos](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: The OnEnter method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate.
trans-unit.target: O método OnEnter também permite que as classes derivadas processar o evento sem anexar um delegado.

trans-unit.source: This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: Este é a preferido técnica para processar o evento de uma classe derivada.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.EventArgs> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.EventArgs>que contém os dados do evento.</xref:System.EventArgs>

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control.Leave"></xref> event of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TabPage"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Gera o <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control.Leave"> </xref> eventos do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TabPage"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: In [!INCLUDE[dnprdnext](~/add/includes/dnprdnext-md.md)], the tab is considered part of the tab page for determining when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Enter> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Leave> events of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage> occur.
trans-unit.target: No [!INCLUDE[dnprdnext](~/add/includes/dnprdnext-md.md)], no separador é considerado parte da página de separador para determinar quando a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Enter>e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Leave>eventos do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage>ocorrer.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Leave> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Enter>

trans-unit.source: In earlier versions of the .NET Framework, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Enter> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Leave> events of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage> do not occur when focus enters or leaves a tab, but only when focus enters or leaves the client rectangle of the tab page.
trans-unit.target: Em versões anteriores do .NET Framework, o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Enter>e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Leave>eventos do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage>ocorre quando o foco entra ou sai de um separador, mas apenas quando o foco entra ou sai o retângulo de cliente da página de separador.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Leave> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Enter>

trans-unit.source: Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate.
trans-unit.target: Gerar um evento invoca o processador de eventos através de um delegado.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Events](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte [eventos](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: The OnLeave method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate.
trans-unit.target: O método OnLeave também permite que as classes derivadas processar o evento sem anexar um delegado.

trans-unit.source: This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: Este é a preferido técnica para processar o evento de uma classe derivada.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.EventArgs> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.EventArgs>que contém os dados do evento.</xref:System.EventArgs>

trans-unit.source: Paints the background of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TabPage"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Desenha a imagem de fundo do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TabPage"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The system calls this method to paint the background of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage>.
trans-unit.target: O sistema chama este método para a imagem de fundo de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage> de pintura

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.UseVisualStyleBackColor%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.RenderWithVisualStyles%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property values are both `true` and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.Appearance%2A> property of the parent <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl> is <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabAppearance>, this method paints the background using the current visual style.
trans-unit.target: Quando o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.UseVisualStyleBackColor%2A>e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.RenderWithVisualStyles%2A?displayProperty=fullName>valores de propriedade são ambos `true` e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.Appearance%2A>propriedade do principal <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl>é <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabAppearance>, este método desenha a imagem de fundo utilizando o estilo visual actual.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabAppearance> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.Appearance%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.RenderWithVisualStyles%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.UseVisualStyleBackColor%2A>

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, this method paints the background as usual.
trans-unit.target: Caso contrário, este método desenha a imagem de fundo como habitualmente.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs"></xref> that contains data useful for painting the background.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs"> </xref> que contém dados útil para desenhar a imagem de fundo.

trans-unit.source: This property is not meaningful for this control.
trans-unit.target: Esta propriedade não é significativa para este controlo.

trans-unit.source: The size of a rectangular area into which the control can fit.
trans-unit.target: O tamanho de uma área retangular na qual pode ajustar o controlo.

trans-unit.source: This member overrides <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.SetBoundsCore%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: Este membro substitui <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.SetBoundsCore%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.

trans-unit.source: The new <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Left*> property value of the control.
trans-unit.target: A nova <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Left*>valor da propriedade do controlo.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Left*>

trans-unit.source: The new <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Top*> property value of the control.
trans-unit.target: A nova <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Top*>valor da propriedade do controlo.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Top*>

trans-unit.source: The new <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Width*> property value of the control.
trans-unit.target: A nova <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Width*>valor da propriedade do controlo.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Width*>

trans-unit.source: The new <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Height*> property value of the control.
trans-unit.target: A nova <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Height*>valor da propriedade do controlo.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Height*>

trans-unit.source: A bitwise combination of <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BoundsSpecified"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: Uma combinação bit a bit de <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BoundsSpecified"> </xref> valores.

trans-unit.source: This property is not meaningful for this control.
trans-unit.target: Esta propriedade não é significativa para este controlo.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.TabIndex%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property indicates the order in which controls receive focus as a user presses the TAB key on a form.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.TabIndex%2A?displayProperty=fullName>propriedade indica a ordem na qual os controlos recebem o foco como um utilizador premir a tecla de tabulação num formulário.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.TabIndex%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage> controls are contained within <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl> controls, however, and do not receive focus individually as part of the form's TAB order.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage>controlos estão incluídos <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl>controla, no entanto e não receber o foco individualmente como parte da ordem de tabulação do formulário.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl></xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage>

trans-unit.source: This property is therefore meaningless for this class.
trans-unit.target: Esta propriedade, por isso, está sem significado para esta classe.

trans-unit.source: The tab order of the control.
trans-unit.target: Ordem de tabulação do controlo.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.TabIndex*> property changes.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando o valor da <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.TabIndex*>alterações de propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.TabIndex*>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.TabIndex%2A> property is not meaningful for this control, although you can change its value and handle the TabIndexChanged event to detect the change.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.TabIndex%2A>propriedade não é significativa para este controlo, embora o pode alterar o respetivo valor e processar o evento de TabIndexChanged para detetar a alteração.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.TabIndex%2A>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: This member is not meaningful for this control.
trans-unit.target: Este membro não é significativo para este controlo.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage> controls are contained within <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl> controls and do not receive focus individually as part of the form's TAB order.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage>controlos estão incluídos <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl>controlos e não receber o foco individualmente como parte da ordem de tabulação do formulário.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl></xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage>

trans-unit.source: This property is therefore meaningless for this class.
trans-unit.target: Esta propriedade, por isso, está sem significado para esta classe.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A predefinição é <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.TabStop*> property changes.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando o valor da <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.TabStop*>alterações de propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.TabStop*>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.TabStop%2A> property is not meaningful for this control, although you can change its value and handle the TabStopChanged event to detect the change.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.TabStop%2A>propriedade não é significativa para este controlo, embora o pode alterar o respetivo valor e processar o evento de TabStopChanged para detetar a alteração.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.TabStop%2A>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the text to display on the tab.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o texto a apresentar no separador.

trans-unit.source: Changing the Text property value does not automatically center the new value on the tab if the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl> has a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.SizeMode%2A> property value of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabSizeMode>.
trans-unit.target: Alterar o valor de propriedade de texto não automaticamente center o novo valor no separador se <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl>tem um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.SizeMode%2A>valor da propriedade de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabSizeMode>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabSizeMode> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.SizeMode%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl>

trans-unit.source: You can work around this limitation by setting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.ItemSize%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property or by removing the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage> from the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.TabPages%2A?displayProperty=fullName> collection and adding it back to the collection.
trans-unit.target: Pode contornar esta limitação, definindo o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.ItemSize%2A?displayProperty=fullName>propriedade ou removendo a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage>do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.TabPages%2A?displayProperty=fullName>coleção e adicionando-a novamente para a coleção.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.TabPages%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.ItemSize%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: Both of these actions will automatically center the text.
trans-unit.target: Ambas estas ações automaticamente irão centrar o texto.

trans-unit.source: The text to display on the tab.
trans-unit.target: O texto a apresentar no separador.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.Text*> property changes.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando o valor da <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.Text*>alterações de propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.Text*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the ToolTip text for this tab.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o texto da descrição para este separador.

trans-unit.source: This tab page belongs to a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl>.
trans-unit.target: Esta página de separador pertence a um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl>

trans-unit.source: The ToolTip text appears when the user moves the mouse over the tab if the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.ShowToolTips%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl> is `true`.
trans-unit.target: O texto da descrição é apresentada quando o utilizador move o rato sobre o separador se o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.ShowToolTips%2A>propriedade o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl>é `true`.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.ShowToolTips%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information about ToolTips, see the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip> class.
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre as descrições, consulte a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip>classe.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip>

trans-unit.source: The ToolTip text for this tab.
trans-unit.target: O texto de descrição para este separador.

trans-unit.source: Returns a string containing the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.Text*> property.
trans-unit.target: Devolve uma cadeia contendo o valor da <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.Text*>propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.Text*>

trans-unit.source: A string containing the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.Text*> property.
trans-unit.target: Uma cadeia contendo o valor da <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.Text*>propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.Text*>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TabPage"></xref> background renders using the current visual style when visual styles are enabled.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor que indica se o <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TabPage"> </xref> em segundo plano compõe utilizando o estilo visual actual quando estilos visuais estiverem ativados.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage> background uses the current visual style only when the UseVisualStyleBackColor and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.RenderWithVisualStyles%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property values are both `true`.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage>em segundo plano utiliza estilo visual actual apenas quando o UseVisualStyleBackColor e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.RenderWithVisualStyles%2A?displayProperty=fullName>valores de propriedade são ambos `true`.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.RenderWithVisualStyles%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage>

trans-unit.source: When the UseVisualStyleBackColor and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.RenderWithVisualStyles%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property values are both `true` and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.Appearance%2A> property of the parent <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl> is <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabAppearance>, the default value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.BackColor%2A> property is <xref:System.Drawing.Color.Transparent%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Quando o UseVisualStyleBackColor e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.RenderWithVisualStyles%2A?displayProperty=fullName>valores de propriedade são ambos `true` e a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.Appearance%2A>propriedade do elemento principal <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl>é <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabAppearance>, o valor predefinido da <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.BackColor%2A>propriedade é <xref:System.Drawing.Color.Transparent%2A>.</xref:System.Drawing.Color.Transparent%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.BackColor%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabAppearance> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.Appearance%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.RenderWithVisualStyles%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: Child controls that you place on the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage> inherit the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.BackColor%2A> value by default, so this behavior causes the background of the child controls to render with the current visual style.
trans-unit.target: Controlos subordinados que coloque no <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage>Herdar o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.BackColor%2A>valor por predefinição, pelo que este comportamento faz com que o fundo da subordinadas controlos para compor com estilo visual actual.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.BackColor%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage>

trans-unit.source: Changing the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.BackColor%2A> property automatically sets the UseVisualStyleBackColor property to `false`.
trans-unit.target: Alterar o valor da <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.BackColor%2A>propriedade define automaticamente a propriedade de UseVisualStyleBackColor como `false`.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.BackColor%2A>

trans-unit.source: If you want the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage> background to render using visual styles but you want the child controls to inherit a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.BackColor%2A> value that you specify, set the UseVisualStyleBackColor property after you set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.BackColor%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Se pretender que o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage>em segundo plano para compor utilizando estilos visuais, mas pretende que os controlos subordinados para herdar um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.BackColor%2A>valor que especificar, defina a propriedade de UseVisualStyleBackColor depois de definir o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.BackColor%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.BackColor%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.BackColor%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to render the background using the current visual style; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>para compor o fundo utilizando o estilo visual actual; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A predefinição é <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: This member is not meaningful for this control.
trans-unit.target: Este membro não é significativo para este controlo.

trans-unit.source: This member is not meaningful for this control.
trans-unit.target: Este membro não é significativo para este controlo.

trans-unit.source: To hide a tab in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl>, you must remove it from the control's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.TabPages%2A> collection.
trans-unit.target: Para ocultar um separador um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl>, deve removê-lo a partir do controlo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.TabPages%2A>coleção.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.TabPages%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl>

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A predefinição é <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.Visible*> property changes.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando o valor da <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.Visible*>alterações de propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.Visible*>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.Visible%2A> property is not meaningful for this control, although you can change its value and handle the VisibleChanged event to detect the change.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.Visible%2A>propriedade não é significativa para este controlo, embora o pode alterar o respetivo valor e processar o evento de VisibleChanged para detetar a alteração.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.Visible%2A>

trans-unit.source: To hide a tab in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl>, you must remove it from the control's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.TabPages%2A> collection.
trans-unit.target: Para ocultar um separador um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl>, deve removê-lo a partir do controlo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.TabPages%2A>coleção.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.TabPages%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.
